item.description:
Murder at the Wellness Center

Look At Me Now, A Wellness Center will be the host site for a Murder Mystery Gala in coordination with Catch a Healthy Habit Cafe.
Enjoy a fun and social evening of spontaneity and improvisation.
Guests will enjoy live music and h'orderves when suddenly a murder occurs and the participants determine the motive and solve the crime.
Prizes and awards will be presented based on best actor, best costume,
most outrageous accent and best super sleuth.
The first event begins on Saturday, October 11, 2008 6:30pm.

Pre-registration is required and there is a $20.00 admission fee per person.
Please contact Lori either by phone or in the Unknown Zone Members Section
Regarding Pre-registration & Payment.

For additional information call Lori Larsen at (203)-933-2200.

http://www.lookatmeno...

www.lookatmenow22.com/

http://mail.google.co...

mail.google.com/mail/?ui=2&ik=ddbbbd8ff0&attid=0.1&disp=inline&view=att&th=11c1658bcd30d3ea


Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Lori's store. I was using that parking area over a decade ago
Long before Lori even moved into that store.

On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant
(Restaurant has had a few different names over the years
But this is its latest name.).
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony's.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Lori's store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left.
Lori's store is a few stores in.

This should be a fun Meet Up.

9/28 This is a reminder memo.

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Lori Larsen is POC for this Mystery Event.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Helps To Solve Murder Mystery at the Wellness Center on 10/11
